title: Find the Githyanki Creche
content:
.

Find the Githyanki Crèche Walkthrough

Find the Githyanki Crèche is a subquest of Find a Cure.

You will have to go to the Mountain pass (X:100 Y:547) and a cutscene will play where a dragon will burn down the bridge. After the cutscene, a dialogue sequence with Lae'zel will begin, she tells you that the Crèche should be near. You will have the following dialogue options.

The Githyanki look dangerous. Stay back. The dragon incinerated those soldiers - surely this isn't safe? And we'll just p
